ENTRANCE_HALL.long_desc: This is the entrance to  the large, spooky manor. The hall continues to the north, and there are rooms to the east and the west. To the south is the front door. Stairs lead upwards.

OUTSIDE_MANOR.long_desc: You are right outside the manor. To the North, a door leads into the manor. To the northeast, a path winds along the outside of the building. You can also cross the street to the south.

GARDEN.long_desc: This is a decrepit garden. There are vegetable beds and flower pots, but all the plants look like they have been dead for many years. A path leads past the garden southwest and north. An old shed stands to the east, and a rickety fire escape climbs up the house.

EMPTY_ROOM.long_desc: This large room is completely empty. Weird. The exit is to the south.

LIVING_ROOM.long_desc: This is a large room, with dusty couches, rotting coffee tables and a broken chandelier. There are exits to the east and the north.

LIVING_BATHROOM.long_desc: This is a small bathroom that connects to the living room to the south.

SHED.long_desc: The shed has shelves lined with rusty gardening tools. There are some large sacks of dirt. The ony exit to the shed is to the west.

BACKYARD.long_desc: This is the backyard of the manor. There is a rotting swingset; perhaps there used to be children living here. A dirt path leads to the south, and there is a window to the west that you could easily climb through, though the window itself is missing.

KITCHEN.long_desc: This is a large kitchen, which could probably fit four or five chefs comfortably. None of the appliances seem to work, and some of the walls are crumbling. There is an exit to the south, and an open window is to the east. A stone staircase leads downwards.

MASTER_BEDROOM.long_desc: This is a giant bedroom. Unlike what you have seen before, this actually looks like it has been used recently. The sheets are creased and the layer of dust on the four-poster has been mostly swept off. An open window leads to a fire escape to the east, and a door leads west.

UPSTAIRS_HALLWAY.long_desc: This is the second-floor hallway. There is a large statue that sits against the wall. There are rooms to the east, west, and north. Stairs lead downwards to the front door.

FIRE_ESCAPE.long_desc: This fire escape looks like it could fall down at any time. The metal staircase spirals down to the ground, and an open window sits to the west.

DINING_ROOM.long_desc: This dining room is mostly occupied by a large wooden table, which is covered in a thick layer of dust. To the west is the large entrance hall, and a passageway leads to the north.

BASEMENT_HALLWAY.long_desc: This is a stone hallway that runs to the northwest and southeast. There is also a stone staircase leading upwards and a door to the southwest.

WINE_CELLAR.long_desc: This wine cellar still has a couple of bottles, though most are smashed. The only exit is to the northwest

PANTRY.long_desc: This pantry is full of food, but it seems that insects and rodents have gotten to most of it. The only exit is to the southeast

STAFF_BEDROOM.long_desc: This room has a couple of bunkbeds, which look like they would house the staff who worked at the manor. This room is in fairly good condition. There are exits to the northeast and south. A trapdoor leads downwards.

BUNKER_HALLWAY.long_desc: This hallway runs east to west, with openings on either end. A passageway leads to the north, and a ladder with a trapdoor is above you.

BUNKER.long_desc: This underground bunker has a small bed, some empty shelves, and an old carpet on the floor that looks like it has gotten some real beating up.

STAFF_BATHROOM.long_desc: This is a small bathroom that connects to the staff bedroom. There's not much to see here. The only exit is to the north.

THE_VOID.long_desc:
Congratulations. You hacked the system. This is the center hub. Travel to different rooms from this location. 
NORTH = ENTRANCE_HALL   
SOUTH = STAFF_BEDROOM (bring lightsource)  
EAST = MASTER_BEDROOM  
WEST = ELEVATOR_TOP

VOID_UPPER.long_desc: Just a bunch of clouds. COMING SOON

VOID_BASEMENT.long_desc: Find a master key, lightsource, and food in this room.

VOID_CENTER.long_desc: This is the test center. Monsters might be in here sometimes. Or not. Or maybe something else entirely. Who knows? I do. I guess I know. Well, not yet in any case. Nevermind.

ELEVATOR1.long_desc: This is a shiny steel elevator.
